title: Specimen Processor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Francis Hospital and Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: The interview was so easy. They take literally anyone. The turnover rate is pretty bad. And once you get the job, they mistreat you while taking advantage of your hard working ethic.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Francis Hospital and Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: We had a virtual follow up interview since the manager was out when I initially interviewed and shadowed. The interview was good; the manager was friendly and welcoming.  Awaiting to get an official offer from the hiring recruiter.
Interview Questions: What drew me to the specialty of labor & delivery?

title: Monitor Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Francis Hospital and Medical Center (Tulsa, OK) in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions: Apply, Called for an interview,  background, and drug testing, and waiting for a callback.  That is as far as I got with the interview process.  I have nothing else to add.
Interview Questions: Describe yourself and one of your strengths.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Francis Hospital and Medical Center (Roslyn, NY) in Nov 2021
Interview Descriptions: Quick interview.  Seemed like they need help and are understaffed. I was not prepared for the interview. They would probably prefer people they know. I have not heard from them, was very interested but I do not believe I made a very good first impression.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in the future?

title: Regional Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Francis Hospital and Medical Center (Hartford, CT)
Interview Descriptions: Thorough and friendly, I proceeded through several rounds.  Met those that would supervise me and my team.  They spent a good amount of time explaining the structure and challenges of the position.

title: Lab Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Saint Francis Hospital and Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: It was a very casual interview process. There were two people that were doing the interview. There are three interviews in total, the first one was with the lab manager and assistant manager, the second interview is with the department chair and the CFO.
Interview Questions:
1. what motivates you?
2. you main qualities?
3. what best describes you?

title: Student Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Saint Francis Hospital and Medical Center (Hartford, CT) in Apr 2018
Interview Descriptions: It was a very casual process. First I met with HR and she asked me some very basic questions. From there she took me to the floor I applied for and met with the nurse manager. The nurse manager had me shadow an RN for about an hour. After that I had a brief discussion with the nurse manager and within a few weeks I received an offer.
Interview Questions: What made you want to be a nurse?

title: Physician Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Saint Francis Hospital and Medical Center (Hartford, CT) in Apr 2016
Interview Descriptions: It was fine - everyone is very friendly, not intimidating.  Did a tour of the hospital and met some of the staff.  The staff is very nice and informative.  The interviewer left me with the staff for a few so I could ask questions about the job.  Overall a good experience.  I only met 1-2 doctors that were on staff - that you do not work closely with unfortunately.
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in this job?

title: Certified Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Francis Hospital and Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: Short meeting with two people. Easy math test. Walk around department. Typical HR questions. Nothing about my qualifications. It lasted about 35 minutes. I had prepared a resume, but they didn't really look at it. Bring your national certification and state registry paperwork.
Interview Questions: Time you didn't get along with coworkers. How did you resolve that situation. Strengths and Weaknesses.

title: Anesthesia Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Saint Francis Hospital and Medical Center (Hartford, CT)
Interview Descriptions: I went for my interview and was hired the same day, because of my experience from my past job. I had 9 years at Hartford Hospital as an Anesthesia tech.
Interview Questions: How well do I work with others

title: Executive Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Francis Hospital and Medical Center in May 2014
Interview Descriptions: Three intterviews, Human Resiurces, The Executive and  individual CoWorkers.  Interviewed one on one with executive for like one hour and thirty minutes.  Then secondly interviewed with Human Resources Vice President for like one hour with very probing questions borderline unprofessional.
Interview Questions: Why are you leaving your current employer?

title: Mental Health Worker I Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Saint Francis Hospital and Medical Center (Hartford, CT)
Interview Descriptions:
apply online
in person interview with nurse manager 
background check
drug testing
Interview Questions: questions are about dealing with patients

title: Per Diem Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Saint Francis Hospital and Medical Center (Hartford, CT) in Feb 2014
Interview Descriptions: Interview started with Human Resources Personnel. Content of resume was reviewed, focused on experiences. This took about 30 minutes. After the HR interview, I was directed to meet the Nurse Manager of the department. There, I met the NM and Team Leader of the department. Again, the focus was my job experiences, not so much of an interview. I was given a tour of the unit and introduced to some staff.
Interview Questions: Since this was a Per Diem position, no questions were asked, experiences described on the resume were discussed.

title: Student Nurse Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Saint Francis Hospital and Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: Contacted by HR to offer an on site interview. Day of interviews met with HR/Nurse recruiter, she gave me an overview of the hospital and a quick tour. Then I met with nurse manager on the floor I applied to, and shadowed an RN for an hour.

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Francis Hospital and Medical Center (Hartford, CT)
Interview Descriptions: Casual interview, focused on research and lab duties.  Disclosed mouse related work.

title: Senior Systems Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Francis Hospital and Medical Center in Apr 2011
Interview Descriptions: Responded to an opening listed on the hospital's jobs website. Initially interviewed for two positions via a phone interview. The manager was very prompt about getting back to me. I had one series on on-site interviews that was with the manager and then the Clinical Ancillary team. The manager was very effective in interviewing me using scenario based questions and open ended questions. He was looking for specific behaviors, skills and experience. The team was much less adept at interviewing. They provided the answers they were looking for me to provide during the interview. They did provide me a great sense of the culture, team and team expectations.
Interview Questions: Overall the questions were not too difficult or challenging. Questions from the team where I had no experience were the hardest to answer.
